author: cnbc.com
title: Goodfellow Inc. Announces a Change to Its Board of Directors
text:
DELSON, Quebec, April 16, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors announced the election of Mr. Alain Côté as a Director of Goodfellow Inc. (TSX:GDL) at its Annual Meeting of Shareholders effective April 13, 2018.
ABOUT GOODFELLOW
Goodfellow Inc. is one of eastern Canada’s largest independent re-manufacturers and distributors of lumber and hardwood flooring products. Goodfellow shares trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange under the symbol GDL.
Goodfellow Inc.
Patrick Goodfellow
